org.jmesa.view.editor
Interface CellEditor

All Known Subinterfaces:
WorksheetEditor
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCellEditor, AbstractPatternCellEditor, AbstractWorksheetEditor, BasicCellEditor, BsfExpressionCellEditor, CheckboxWorksheetEditor, DateCellEditor, DateTimeCellEditor, ElExpressionCellEditor, GroupCellEditor, HtmlCellEditor, HtmlWorksheetEditor, NumberCellEditor, RemoveRowAddedWorksheetEditor, RemoveRowWorksheetEditor
public interface CellEditor

A CellEditor is used to display the column value. You can either use the pre-canned ones included in JMesa or create something custom. Typically most tables you create will have at least one custom editor.

Since:
2.0
Author:
Jeff Johnston
